faq_items.a1: Yes, our ePub reader is completely free to use with no hidden charges or advertisements.
faq_items.q2: Are my books uploaded to your servers?
faq_items.a2: Not at all. All files are processed locally within your browser. Your privacy is 100% guaranteed.
faq_items.q3: What devices and browsers are supported?
faq_items.a3: Our reader works on all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and across all devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
faq_items.q4: Is my data safe with ePubReader.tech?
faq_items.a4: Absolutely. Your privacy is our top priority. Since all file processing happens locally on your device, no data is ever transmitted to us. Your books remain yours.
faq_items.q5: Can I use this on my mobile device?
